# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="df78e-102">Vytvorenie podpisu e-mailu v Outlooku na webe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df78e-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="df78e-103">ísť na</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df78e-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="df78e-104">**Nastavenia**  >  **Zobrazenie všetkých nastavení**  >  Outlooku **Vytvorenie a odpovedanie**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df78e-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="df78e-105">V časti **podpis e-mailu**zadajte svoj podpis a použite dostupné možnosti formátovania na zmenu jeho vzhľadu.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df78e-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df78e-106">*Poznámka:* Na každé konto môžete mať len jeden podpis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df78e-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="df78e-107">Ďalšie informácie nájdete v téme [Vytvorenie a Pridanie podpisu e-mailu v Outlooku na webe](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="df78e-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
